resources.string: Registration-Captcha has failed! %1$s\nPlease sign in and try again

Failed to add group with name: %s. The problem occurred during a local IO operation.
The group %s already exists in your contact list. Please choose another name.
Failed to add group with name: %s. The problem occurred due to a network failure. Please check your network connection and try again.
Failed to add group with name: %s.
The group name must not be empty.
contact has accepted your authorization request.

contact has rejected your authorization request.

The {0} device or codec is not fully configured in \'Settings…\'. Please check and setup.
Would you like to continue the call?
In the field below, you can enter the new subject for this room.
In the field below, you can enter your new nickname.
The {0} chat room is already joined.
Failed to obtain the {0} chat room configuration form.
Could not obtain the {0} chat room configuration form. Only owners of the chat room can see and change the configuration form.
An error occurred while trying to submit the configuration form for chat room {0}.
List on the right contains users that have member role in this chat room. When chat room is \'Members-only\' those will be the users that are allowed to join.
Saves the chat room for future use
Removes the selected room from the list of saved rooms
In the field below enter the name of the chat room that you would like to create.

You need to be online in order to join the {0} chat room.
You need to be online in order to leave a chat room.
You need to be joined to the chat room in order to do further operations with it.
The {0} chat room requires registration to be joined.
The {0} chat room has requested a password.
You can continue the conversation in the following chat room: {0}
Account connection login failed: User name: {0}\n Server name: {1}\nPlease check your network connection OR contact your network administrator for more information.
The contact displayName must not be empty.
In the field below enter the name of the group you would like to create.
Your contact list does not contain any groups. Please create a group first (File/Create group).
aTalk uses the following third-party libraries: %s
Audio chat with an offline recipient is not allowed.
Click \"Send Cont. Location updates\" Button to apply the new interval setting
Google Play services is not installed on this device.
Demonstrates how to show a Street View panorama and map.
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Check the item for its persistent store to be cleaned and refreshed; Perform only when necessary!\n
Create a new video conference for this chat room
You device camera seems not supporting landscape preview in landscape display. Please use landscape display orientation for video call.

Failed to kick {0}. A general server error occurred.

Failed to kick {0}. You do not have enough privileges to do that.

An error occurred while logging in with account: User name: {0}, Server name: {1}. This is most probably an internal application error. Please report the problem to our developers mailing list.

Unknown error has occurred while delivering your message.
A network problem occurred. Please check your network configuration and try again.
You should be connected to be able to send messages.
Multiple login instants not allowed. The following account: User name: {0}, Server name: {1} has been disconnected.

{1}.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the server\'\'s identity cannot be automatically verified.

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the server\'\'s certificate.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the server\'\'s identity cannot
be automatically verified. Do you want to continue connecting?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the connecting client.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the client\'\'s identity cannot be automatically verified. Do you want to accept the connection?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

{0} can\'\'t verify the identity of the peer {1}.

The certificate is not trusted, which means that the peer\'\'s identity cannot
be automatically verified. Do you want to continue connecting?

For more information, click "Show Certificate".

Error code: {0}

Your call is not secure
Error code: {0}

If you see this message often this may mean a denial-of-service attack!

Too much retries during security negotiation. This may mean that the other party has internet connection problems.
Your call is not secure
Error code: {0}

Failed to send encryption data. Internet data connection or peer is down.
Your call is not secure
Error code: {0}

Authenticating a buddy helps ensure that the person you are talking to is who he or she claims to be. To verify the fingerprint, contact your buddy via some other authenticated channel, such as the telephone or GPG-signed email. Each of you should tell your fingerprint to the other. If everything matches up, you should indicate in the following dialog that *I have* verified the fingerprint.
verified that this is in fact the correct fingerprint for %1$s.
Please enter the fingerprint you received from {0}.
{0} has not been authenticated yet. You should authenticate this buddy.
Private OTR conversation with {0} has started.
{0} has ended his/her private OTR conversation with you; you should do the same.
Private OTR conversation with {0} has ended.
{0} is recording this conversation on your device. You can turn off chat history here.
{0} is NOT recording this conversation. You can activate chat history here.
Your message was not sent. Please end your private OTR conversation with {0}.
{0} has aborted the OTR authentication process.
An error occurred in the OTR authentication process.
{0} sent you an unreadable encrypted message.
Your message was not sent. Private messaging is required.
You sent {0} an unreadable encrypted message. Please end your private conversation with {1} or refresh it.

{0} is trying to initiate an encrypted Off-The-Record conversationwith you. However, your software does not support Off-The-Record messaging. For more information see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Off-the-Record_Messaging
Multiple private OTR conversation instances with {0} detected.
Received message from another OTR conversation instances with {0} detected.
You have unauthenticated buddies. Unverified buddies cannot receive OMEMO message. Check to authenticate.

string.name: plugin_provisioning_PROV_FAILED_MSG
string.html:
Provisioning failed. {0}!
Please, try again later or contact your administrator.

resources.string: Avoid clicking within the message area for multi-item selection operation

string.name: plugin_dnsconfig_lblRedemption_description
string.html: the number of prompt responses that the primary resolver needs to provide before we turn that backup off again

string.name: plugin_dnsconfig_lblPatience_description
string.html: number of ms to wait for a response from primary DNS before starting the backup resolver

resources.string: Treat all domain names as absolute

string.name: plugin_dnsconfig_dnssec_lblNameserversHint
string.html: Multiple servers can be delimited with a comma, e.g. 149.20.64.20, 149.20.64.21 (OARC\'s Open DNSSEC Validating Resolver)

resources.string: Change of the DNSSEC enabled state has failed.

string.name: plugin_dnsconfig_dnssec_RESTART_WARNING
string.html: Note that enabling or disabling DNSSEC disables the parallel resolver and will only take effect the next time you start aTalk.

Logs debug packets of various protocols

For application maximum performances and full features support, aTalk requires you to grant permissions for the following resources access. Without them, aTalk may not work or may have unexpected behavior!
Camera permission is needed for video call setup. Video call will not be available until you grant the permission request
Contacts permission is needed for phone state access and call setup
GPS-Location features will not be available until you grant the permission request
Audio call will not be available until you grant the permission request
Phone features will not be available until you grant the permission request
Saving of received contents in external storage will not be available until you grant the permission request

aTalk may not work properly or may have unexpected behavior as some resources access have been denied!\nIf you have selected \"Don\'t ask again\" option, you need to go to android Settings -> APP INFO for aTalk to enable the resource access permission
You will be presented with each resource needed by aTalk; please proceed to allow aTalk to access the resources for full features supported
